title: DRDO SSPL Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 14 Project Assistant, MTS Posts
description: The DRDO Solid State Physics Laboratory (DRDO SSPL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Project Assistant-I, Project Assistant-II, and MTS Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, ITI, Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, and 12th can apply for the DRDO SSPL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants c...
